actions.committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

official_title: To direct the Secretary of the Army to convey easement over certain lands in La Salle County, Illinois, to the Young Men's Christian Association of Ottawa, Illinois.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army to convey to the Young Men's Christian Association (YMCA) of Ottawa, Illinois, a portion of the easements acquired for the improvement of the Illinois waterway project over a parcel of real property owned by such YMCA, known as the Ottawa, Illinois YMCA Site, and located at 201 E. Jackson Street in Ottawa, except that portion lying below a specified elevation.

titles.title: To direct the Secretary of the Army to convey easement over certain lands in La Salle County, Illinois, to the Young Men's Christian Association of Ottawa, Illinois.
